titleStmt.title: An abstract, almost verbatim (with some necessarie addition,) of The customers apologie, written 18. yeares ago, to shew their distresse in the out-ports, aswell through want of maintenance and meanes to beare out their seruice, as countenance and credit in regard of others
titleStmt.author: Milles, Tho. (Thomas), 1550?-1627?
Milles, Tho. (Thomas), 1550?-1627? Customer's apology.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the British Library.
